analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the performance test with a duration of 1200ms. It is recommended to investigate the causes of the slow loading time and optimize the page to improve its performance.
insights: The TTFB (Time to First Byte) for all pages is relatively low, indicating that the server response time is fast.
The FCP (First Contentful Paint) for all pages is also relatively low, indicating that the page rendering time is fast.

The load time for the homepage is higher than the other pages, which could be due to larger resource sizes or more requests. It is recommended to investigate and optimize the homepage to improve its performance.
